gov.fnal.ppd.dd.display.client

Class DisplayControllerMessagingAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.fnal.ppd.dd.display.DisplayImpl
      • gov.fnal.ppd.dd.display.client.DisplayControllerMessagingAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Display, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DisplayAsConnectionToFireFox

    public abstract class DisplayControllerMessagingAbstract
extends DisplayImpl
    Implement a Dynamic Display using an underlying browser through a simple messaging server
    Author:
    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab (2014)
